techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'Where tillage begins, other arts follow. The farmers therefore are the founders of human civilization.' - Daniel Webster
uniques: Everyone has decided that life is as good as it can get - no more hunter-gathers, farms are the future...

techs.quote: I TOLD YOU, FARMS ARE THE FUTURE.
uniques: This only exists because the game crashes if you only have 1 tech
